Package org.quasar.juse.api

Interface JUSE_BasicFacade

All Known Subinterfaces:
JUSE_ProgramingByContractFacade, JUSE_ProgramingFacade
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicFacade, ProgramingByContractFacade, ProgramingFacade
public interface JUSE_BasicFacade
Author:
fba

  • Method Details

    • getSystem

      org.tzi.use.uml.sys.MSystem getSystem()
      Returns:
      the current system

    • initialize

      JUSE_BasicFacade initialize​(java.lang.String[] args, java.lang.String modelDirectory)
      Parameters:
      args - Arguments passed either at command line or in Eclipse "Run As/Run Configurations/Arguments"
      modelDirectory - Directory where the model to be compiled is
      Returns:
      the initialized Basic Facade

    • compileSpecification

      org.tzi.use.uml.sys.MSystem compileSpecification​(java.lang.String specificationFilename, boolean verbose)
      Parameters:
      specificationFilename - The specification filename (*.use file)
      verbose - If true sends compilation info to console
      Returns:
      the system containing the model

    • readSOIL

      boolean readSOIL​(java.lang.String modelInstancesDirectory, java.lang.String modelInstancesFilename, boolean verbose)
      Processes a SOIL file
      Parameters:
      modelInstancesDirectory - Directory where the SOIL file resides
      modelInstancesFilename - The model instances filename (*.soil file)
      verbose - If true sends commands to console as well
      Returns:
      true if it was able to read the file correctly or false otherwise

    • dumpState

      boolean dumpState​(java.lang.String author, java.lang.String javaWorkspace, java.lang.String cmdFile, boolean verbose)
      Generates a CMD file containing objects, their setup and links among them
      Parameters:
      author - The author of the specification
      javaWorkspace - Workspace directory where the generated commands file is to be created
      cmdFile - Name of the commands file
      verbose - If true sends commands to console as well
      Returns:
      true if the model was previously compiled (and therefore was able to dump the state), or false otherwise

    • command

      void command​(java.lang.String commandLine)
      Parameters:
      commandLine - Command line to be processed by shell

    • createShell

      void createShell()
      Run USE shell; thread gets hung until the shell exits This should be the last call in the program.
